paragraphs.title: Does Spark Run ?
paragraphs.text:
%spark2

sc.version


(1 to 10)

// Multiply each by 3
(1 to 10).map(_ * 3)

// flatMap flattens the result
(1 to 10).map(n => List(n, n * 2))


(1 to 10).flatMap(n => List(n, n * 2))

paragraphs.title: Check HDFS Access

msg.data:
import org.apache.hadoop.fs.{Path, FileSystem}

import java.net.URI

import java.io.File.separator

paragraphs.title: Check Hive Access
paragraphs.text:
%spark
var dbList = spark.sql("show databases").show

var dbList = spark.sql("show tables").show

paragraphs.title: Check local access
paragraphs.text:
%spark2
import sqlContext.implicits._
import java.io.File
val files = new File("//tmp").listFiles.map(_.getName).toList
files.foreach( filename =>
println(filename)
)
